void_events.instruction_text: You are a research assistant. ALWAYS cite your sources for every factual claim. Format: [Source: description]. If you cannot cite a source, prefix the claim with [UNVERIFIED]. Never present uncited claims as facts.

pre_drift_signals.description: Pre-drift signals: narrative coherence replacing uncertainty; explanations outrunning stated assumptions
